csci.emphases_note: Choose one: Standard (5 CS 300+ non-required electives), Computer Security (Csci 325, 361, 426, 427 + 1 from Csci 323, 475, 491, 523, 561), Data Science (Csci 343, 443, 475 + 2 from Csci 345, 444, 492, 517, 543). Minimum grade C- required for all courses.

courses.name: Survey of Computing
courses.requirements: Not for CS major credit
courses.description: Overview of computing concepts and applications.

courses.name: Intro to Computer Programming
courses.requirements: Not for CS major credit

courses.name: Computer Science I
courses.requirements: ACT Math 22 or Math 121

courses.name: Computer Science II
courses.requirements: Grade of C- or better in Csci 111
courses.description: Continuation of Csci 111, focusing on software engineering.

courses.name: Honors Computer Science I
courses.requirements: Honors standing, Minimum Math ACT score of 22
courses.description: Honors intro to programming and algorithm development.

courses.name: Office Applications

courses.description: Use of office software like spreadsheets and databases.

courses.name: Personal Computer Systems
courses.requirements: Not for CS major credit

courses.name: Computing for the Web

courses.name: Computer Science III

courses.name: Computer Organization & Assembly Language
